Name: Arabica
Description: Arabica coffee is known for its smooth, complex flavor and is grown at higher altitudes.

Name: Robusta
Description: Robusta coffee is hardier and has a stronger, more bitter flavor compared to Arabica.

Name: Elgon Blue
Description: Elgon Blue is a high-quality Arabica variety grown in the Mount Elgon region.

Name: Nganda
Description: Nganda is a type of Robusta coffee known for its resistance to diseases.

Name: Erecta
Description: Erecta is another variety of Robusta with good yield and pest resistance.
